title: Martin Short | Trump Shakes Up Campaign as Biden’s Lead Grows: A Closer Look
description:
Seth takes a closer look at the president shaking up his flailing campaign as the coronavirus outbreak spirals further out of control.

Then, he speaks with the legendary actor and comedian Martin Short.
